time: the time of a solar eclipse
the time of a lunar eclipse.

biography_text.text: Your name is {monster_name}, a member of the {adjective} species {monster_species}. The first {monster_species} was {verb} by {scientist_first_name} {scientist_last_name} in {year} at {time}. The species {monster_species} is known for its {physical_adjective} {color} {attribute}. It is said to even be able to {ability}!

The {monster_species} is an {adjective} species, and you, {monster_name}, are no exception. {monster_species} is famed for its {physical_adjective} {attribute}. Whispers say that when brewed with {ingredients[0]} and {ingredients[1]} at {time}, a foul, {color} brew will be produced, granting it's drinker the ability to {ability}! This species was {verb} by {scientist_first_name} {scientist_last_name} in {year}.
